tentpoles.title: The First Dream
tentpoles.description: Adrian discovers Voyager 2's strange signals. That night, geometric patterns invade his dreams. He wakes to find he's drawn them perfectly on his walls during sleep. Beautiful, impossible mathematics he doesn't remember learning.

tentpoles.title: The Changed
tentpoles.description: Adrian tracks down other signal listeners. Finds Sera and three others in similar states - all experiencing the dreams, the patterns. Government quarantines them. Adrian realizes exposure has changed him fundamentally.

tentpoles.title: Voyager's Nature
tentpoles.description: Through pooled visions, the Changed perceive Voyager's current form - it's no longer just a probe. It passed through a region where reality is thin, became partially extradimensional. It's returning because it's being pulled back, and Earth is in the path.

tentpoles.title: The Cost Revealed
tentpoles.description: Adrian reaches Stage 2 - synesthesia manifests. He sees sounds, hears colors, feels radio waves. Enhanced perception comes with emotional flattening. Lena visits quarantine; he realizes he feels nothing for her anymore. Terrified by his own indifference.

tentpoles.title: Point of No Return
tentpoles.description: Dr. Okonkwo discovers the Change is irreversible and progressive. Adrian faces choice: refuse further signal exposure and slow progression, or embrace it and learn more. Sera has reached Stage 3. She shows him what seeing reality's code looks like. He chooses to listen.

tentpoles.title: Network Effect
tentpoles.description: Adrian reaches Stage 3. Can now perceive other Changed individuals as nodes in a network. They share thoughts, perceptions. It's terrifyingly intimate and magnificent. Realizes they're becoming a gestalt intelligence.

tentpoles.title: The Reeves Protocol
tentpoles.description: Colonel Reeves presents evidence to government: Changed are infectious to social cohesion, share hivemind, no longer human. Recommends termination. Dr. Okonkwo fights for more time. Adrian overhears through the network - Sera, who's in another facility, heard it too. The Changed know they're marked for death.

tentpoles.title: Seeing the Truth
tentpoles.description: Adrian has breakthrough perception - sees the underlying mathematical structure of reality. Understands that consciousness itself is just pattern recognition. Meaning is emergent property. Horror: nothing matters. Beauty: everything is pattern. Simultaneously nihilistic and transcendent.

tentpoles.title: Lena's Choice
tentpoles.description: Lena smuggles herself into quarantine, exposes herself to recordings of the signals. Desperate to understand, to follow Adrian into the Change. Adrian, still retaining fragment of humanity, stops her - makes her leave. Last act of human love before he loses it completely.

tentpoles.title: Voyager Visible
tentpoles.description: Voyager 2 detected entering solar system. When imaged through telescope, it's... wrong. Geometry that human eyes can't process. Cameras capture it but observers get nosebleeds, vertigo. Adrian and Changed can look directly at it - they see it as beautiful. The rift between Changed and human is now absolute.

tentpoles.title: The Escape
tentpoles.description: Reeves moves to execute termination order. The Changed network acts as one - they escape facilities simultaneously across the globe. Sera, now Stage 4, has seen the options through time. Guides them to a location: Green Bank, where it started. They'll meet Voyager there.

tentpoles.title: Reality Fracture Begins
tentpoles.description: As Voyager approaches, the thin region follows it. Local reality destabilizes - physics inconsistencies, time anomalies, geometric impossibilities manifest. The Changed are unaffected, but humans can't navigate these zones. World beginning to split into Changed and human territories.

tentpoles.title: Okonkwo's Breakthrough
tentpoles.description: Dr. Okonkwo discovers a way to reverse early-stage Change - but it requires killing the neural patterns that make someone capable of advanced pattern recognition. It would save humanity but eliminate genius. She destroys her own research, can't make that choice for humanity.

tentpoles.title: The Two Doors
tentpoles.description: Adrian, now partially Stage 4, perceives the truth: Voyager offers two evolutionary paths. Humanity can remain as is, stable and mortal. Or transform entirely, become posthuman pattern-beings living in higher dimensional space. But can't be both - species must choose together.

tentpoles.title: The Door Opens
tentpoles.description: Voyager arrives at Green Bank. Adrian makes final choice: closes the door. Uses his Changed abilities to send Voyager away, taking only those who've already transformed. Sacrifices his transcendence to preserve humanity's right to evolve naturally. Sera and other Stage 4 depart. Adrian, locked in Stage 3 limbo, remains. Neither human nor transcendent. Lena finds him - they're both broken, but together.
